name: getUserDefaultColumns
description:
Returns the default [issue table columns](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/XYdKLg) for the user. If `accountId` is not passed in the request, the calling user's details are returned.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:**

 *  *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLgl), to get the column details for any user.
 *  Permission to access Jira, to get the calling user's column details.

accountId.description: The account ID of the user, which uniquely identifies the user across all Atlassian products. For example, *5b10ac8d82e05b22cc7d4ef5*.

username.description: This parameter is no longer available See the [deprecation notice](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/deprecation-notice-user-privacy-api-migration-guide/) for details.

$block: Details of an issue navigator column item.
